Question.Subject: Why is Centurylink services so expensive?
Question.Content: ok, ive only been with them 1 month, all i have with them is phone service and 0.77 mbps internet which is slowest high speed and my first months bill is $155 0_o i dont even have cable channels with that either what would they charge me if i upgraded to there 10mb speed 200!!!!! and they advertise as low as $29.99 yeah right they say additional fees and charges may apply, but they dont tell you its quadruple times there advertised price!!!!
Question.ChosenAnswer: They are just trying to cheat you.Instead of going to court just change your service.

Answer.Content: They are just trying to cheat you.Instead of going to court just change your service.
http://www.cable-internet-service-providers.com/ To get a free quote today on cheap internet/phone service follow this link
